definitions.explanation: Base trait for descriptions of ODI specific properties or ideas.

hasParameters.explanation: semantic version number of the entity
hasParameters.name: versionNumber

definitions.explanation: identifies attributes that are a part of the ODI standard
identifies attributes that are reserved to be included in specific ODI entities
identifies attributes that are required to be included in specific ODI entities
identifies entities that are a part of the ODI standard
root for ODI semantic meanings
identifies entities or attributes that are a type of interaction with a party
identifies entities or attributes that are a type of contact or identity of a party
identifies appointments
identifies email messages
identifies phone calls
identifies phone numbers
identifies email addresses
identifies physical addresses
identifies objects that are a part of the ODI standard
identifies entities that are a part of the ODI standard
identifies type attributes that are a part of the ODI standard
identifies attributes using entities as types that are a part of the ODI standard
identifies entities created during conversion from odi format

hasParameters.explanation: The namespace urn used in an odi.json file to point at the definition location of this tagged entity. This lets us avoid duplicating entities when we create copies of defintions from the same original place.
hasParameters.name: definedAt

definitions.explanation: identifies attributes that contain the entity name for an identifier or labels a fixed entity name value for every identifier in an entity
identifies attributes that contain the scope value for an identifier or labels a fixed scope value for every identifier in an entity
